manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Graphic Novel Meets Sound Book This innovative book amps up the action of Marvel comics! The 96 page graphic novel includes 6 stories and 5 sound buttons that your little one can press to add another layer of immersion. Hands On Interaction Hands on interaction with the Play-a-Sound buttons engage young readers, holds their attention, and encourages learning through play. Marvel Classics Come to Life The incredible characters of marvel have been entertaining children and their parents for 80 years, and with the help of a Play-a-Sound module the amazing creations come alive.

Marvel Spider-man - Me Reader Electronic Reader with 8 Book Library Avengers, Spider-man, and Guardians of the Galaxy Me Reader 8-Book Library Spider-man I'm Ready to Read Sound Book Spidey and His Amazing Friends Go-Webs-Go! Interactive Book and Sound Wristband Spider-man - Pop-Up Board Book and Sound Flashlight Toy Set Spider-Man Look and Find Activity Book More Great Children's Books!

Me Readers and First Smart Pads with 8-Book Library With the Me Reader your little one can select which of their 8 included books they want to read, and press the color and shape coded buttons to hear it read out loud. The My First Smart pad is a double sided tablet that allows your little one to go through their included 8-book set and complete over 100 interactive activities. Sound and Song Books Sound and song books offer a hands on interactive experience for young readers. The multi sensory reading adventure stimulates their imagination, while pressing the sound buttons helps with their matching, comparing, and motor skills. My First Library Book Blocks Twelve Just-My-Size tiny board books come packaged in a fantastic case! Your little one will love carrying the case and taking out/putting back their books while developing a love for reading and early motor skills. Look and Find Activity Books Search for hidden objects in wonderfully illustrated scenes! Whether your little one is a Disney Princess or a PAW Patrol pup, PI Kids has the perfect Look and Find for you! Look and Find are available as hardcover books and My First Look and Find are available as board books.

Phoenix International Publications, Inc At Phoenix International Publications, Inc., we are committed to crafting engaging, educational, and entertaining books for young readers to encourage a lifelong love of story time. Together with licensing partners Disney, Nickelodeon, Sesame Workshop, Eric Carle, among others, and our own collection of family favorite original authors and illustrators, we’ve worked to interlace beloved characters with charming illustrations, activities, sounds, and songs for over three decades. Our stories, and eye for digital advancement, provide a unique interactive reading experience that will delight any child and inspire a lifelong love of reading for the whole family. Our sound books, picture books, board books, apps, and activity and song books are available at all booksellers and online retailers. Our PI Kids brand is recognized worldwide and our books have been translated into more than 35 languages.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars The audio sound effects are not audible
reviews.reviewText: You can hear the sound sfx but they really hard to hear. They also don't coincide with the book. They are just there with not integration with the story.
